thread.title: Meek Mill Claims Nicki Minaj Pays Blogs To Discredit Him
thread.title_full: Meek Mill Claims Nicki Minaj Pays Blogs To Discredit Him

author: Shaun M
title: Meek Mill Claims Nicki Minaj Pays Blogs To Discredit Him
text:
Home > Entertainment > Meek Mill Claims Nicki Minaj Pays Blogs To Discredit Him Meek Mill Claims Nicki Minaj Pays Blogs To Discredit Him 0 0 1 Posted by Shaun M , Mar 17, 2017 at 06:46pm Meek Mill went on an IG rant claiming Nicki Minaj pays gossip blogs to discredit him. 
When popular hip hop gossip blog Baller Alert posted about a party attended by Meek Mill , the Philly rapper got upset. He dissed its founder Karen Civil on Instagram, claiming she was on Nicki Minaj 's "pay roll." 
"Yâ€™all bum ass Internet hoes being paid by Nicki lol to try to discredit my name," Meek wrote. "By the way Karen I got the tapes of ya corny ass saying Nicki paying ya corny ass Nicki paying yâ€™all for this geek shitâ€¦after all I did for ya nut ass yâ€™all sold yâ€™all souls for a few bandsâ€¦" 
According to Meek, Civil is one of the reasons he's been getting so much bad press this year. He claims his ex-girlfriend has paid multiple blogs to tarnish his reputation. He adds that Baller Alert omits to talk about Minaj's brother Jalani Maraj to keep their "pay roll" intact. 
"Why yâ€™all donâ€™t post about that man molesting that lil girl? Oh I forgot yâ€™all on payroll." 
Bossip reports that Meek and Civil used to be on good terms because she dated Deen, one of his crew.The Dreamchaser's name has been at the center of several controversies in recent months. Just this week, he grabbed headline ebcasue of his ongoing feud with Oschino and his arrest after a conflict with TSA workers in St. Louis.
